items.title: Awesome Ember
items.content_text:
### Packages / Data validation

*   [ember-line-graph](https://astronomersiva.github.io/ember-line-graph/) - Zero-dependency ember-addon to draw line-charts.

### Packages / Security

*   [ember-permissions (‚≠ê14)](https://github.com/Bagaar/ember-permissions) - Permission management for Ember applications.

### Packages / Examples

*   [Ember.js RealWorld Implementation (‚≠ê181)](https://github.com/gothinkster/ember-realworld) - Ember.js codebase containing real world examples (CRUD, auth, advanced patterns, etc) that adheres to the RealWorld spec and API.

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Currency Exchange

- API: [Frankfurter](https://www.frankfurter.app/docs)

  Description: Exchange rates, currency conversion and time series

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes
items.content_html:
Currency Exchange

  • API: Frankfurter

    Description: Exchange rates, currency conversion and time series

    Auth: No

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Yes

items.title: Awesome Machine Learning
items.content_text:
### Python / General-Purpose Machine Learning

*   [Pylearn2 (‚≠ê2.8k)](https://github.com/lisa-lab/pylearn2) - A Machine Learning library based on [Theano (‚≠ê9.9k)](https://github.com/Theano/Theano). **\[Deprecated]**

### Tools / Misc

*   [Kedro (‚≠ê10k)](https://github.com/quantumblacklabs/kedro/) - Kedro is a data and development workflow framework that implements best practices for data pipelines with an eye towards productionizing machine learning models.
*   [guild.ai](https://guild.ai/) - Tool to log, analyze, compare and "optimize" experiments. It's cross-platform and framework independent, and provided integrated visualizers such as tensorboard.
items.content_html:
Python / General-Purpose Machine Learning

  • Pylearn2 (‚≠ê2.8k) - A Machine Learning library based on Theano (‚≠ê9.9k). [Deprecated]

Tools / Misc

  • Kedro (‚≠ê10k) - Kedro is a data and development workflow framework that implements best practices for data pipelines with an eye towards productionizing machine learning models.
  • guild.ai - Tool to log, analyze, compare and "optimize" experiments. It's cross-platform and framework independent, and provided integrated visualizers such as tensorboard.

items.title: Awesome Dart
items.content_text:
### Server Frameworks

*   [Jaguar (‚≠ê464)](https://github.com/Jaguar-dart/jaguar) - A server framework built for speed, simplicity and extensibility.
*   [Shelf](https://pub.dartlang.org/packages/shelf) - Shelf makes it easy to create and compose web servers and parts of web servers.
    *   There are many packages written for Shelf. By convention they start with [shelf\_](https://pub.dartlang.org/search?q=shelf_).
*   [Vane (‚≠ê59)](https://github.com/Scorpiion/Vane) - Framework with built-in server runtime environment and middleware system.
*   [Rikulo Stream (‚≠ê235)](https://github.com/rikulo/stream) - Lightweight web server with request routing, filtering, template engine, WebSocket, MVC design pattern, and file-based static resources.

### Game Development

*   [Flame (‚≠ê10k)](https://github.com/luanpotter/flame#readme) - A minimalist Flutter game engine.

### Database

*   [PostgreSQL (‚≠ê85)](https://github.com/xxgreg/dart_postgresql) - PostgreSQL database driver.

### Tools

*   [dart2js](https://www.dartlang.org/tools/dart2js/) - compiles Dart code to JavaScript.
*   [js2dart (‚≠ê62)](https://github.com/vojtajina/js2dart) - compiles Javascript code to Dart.
*   [webdev\_proxy (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/Workiva/webdev_proxy) - A proxy wrapper around [webdev (‚≠ê215)](https://github.com/dart-lang/webdev) which adds support for rerouting 404s to the index, allowing for HTML push-based routing while running locally.

### IDEs, Editors, and Plugins

*   [Sublime Text Package (‚≠ê264)](https://github.com/guillermooo/dart-sublime-bundle) - Sublime Text 3 Dart Package.
*   [Emacs Plugin (‚≠ê19)](https://github.com/nex3/dart-mode) - An Emacs mode for the Dart language.
*   [Vim Plugin (‚≠ê651)](https://github.com/dart-lang/dart-vim-plugin) - Syntax highlighting for Dart in Vim.
*   [VSCode Plugin](https://dartcode.org/) - Dart support for Visual Studio Code.
items.content_html:
Server Frameworks

  • Jaguar (‚≠ê464) - A server framework built for speed, simplicity and extensibility.
  • Shelf - Shelf makes it easy to create and compose web servers and parts of web servers.
    • There are many packages written for Shelf. By convention they start with shelf_.
  • Vane (‚≠ê59) - Framework with built-in server runtime environment and middleware system.
  • Rikulo Stream (‚≠ê235) - Lightweight web server with request routing, filtering, template engine, WebSocket, MVC design pattern, and file-based static resources.

Game Development

  • Flame (‚≠ê10k) - A minimalist Flutter game engine.

Database

  • PostgreSQL (‚≠ê85) - PostgreSQL database driver.

Tools

  • dart2js - compiles Dart code to JavaScript.
  • js2dart (‚≠ê62) - compiles Javascript code to Dart.
  • webdev_proxy (‚≠ê11) - A proxy wrapper around webdev (‚≠ê215) which adds support for rerouting 404s to the index, allowing for HTML push-based routing while running locally.

IDEs, Editors, and Plugins

  • Sublime Text Package (‚≠ê264) - Sublime Text 3 Dart Package.
  • Emacs Plugin (‚≠ê19) - An Emacs mode for the Dart language.
  • Vim Plugin (‚≠ê651) - Syntax highlighting for Dart in Vim.
  • VSCode Plugin - Dart support for Visual Studio Code.

items.title: Awesome Ios
items.content_text:
### Reactive Programming

*   [OpenCombine (‚≠ê2.8k)](https://github.com/broadwaylamb/OpenCombine) ‚Äî Open source implementation of Apple's Combine framework for processing values over time.

### Tag / Collection View Layout

*   [WSTagsField (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/whitesmith/WSTagsField) - An iOS text field that represents different Tags.
*   [YNSearch (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/younatics/YNSearch) - Awesome fully customizable search view like Pinterest written in Swift 3.

### TextField & TextView / Collection View Layout

*   [IQDropDownTextField (‚≠ê312)](https://github.com/hackiftekhar/IQDropDownTextField) - TextField with DropDown support using UIPickerView.
*   [StatefulViewController (‚≠ê2.1k)](https://github.com/aschuch/StatefulViewController) - Placeholder views based on content, loading, error or empty states.
*   [MBAutoGrowingTextView (‚≠ê125)](https://github.com/MatejBalantic/MBAutoGrowingTextView) - An auto-layout base UITextView subclass which automatically grows with user input and can be constrained by maximal and minimal height - all without a single line of code.
*   [TextFieldEffects (‚≠ê6k)](https://github.com/raulriera/TextFieldEffects) - Custom UITextFields effects inspired by Codrops, built using Swift.
*   [TJTextField (‚≠ê44)](https://github.com/tejas-ardeshna/TJTextField) - UITextField with underline and left image.
*   [UITextField-Navigation (‚≠ê445)](https://github.com/T-Pham/UITextField-Navigation) - UITextField-Navigation adds next, previous and done buttons to the keyboard for your UITextFields.
*   [AutoCompleteTextField (‚≠ê65)](https://github.com/nferocious76/AutoCompleteTextField) - Auto complete with suggestion textfield.
*   [PasswordTextField (‚≠ê310)](https://github.com/PiXeL16/PasswordTextField) - A custom TextField with a switchable icon which shows or hides the password and enforce good password policies.
*   [AnimatedTextInput (‚≠ê758)](https://github.com/jobandtalent/AnimatedTextInput) - Animated UITextField and UITextView replacement for iOS.
*   [NxEnabled (‚≠ê34)](https://github.com/Otbivnoe/NxEnabled) - Library which allows you binding `enabled` property of button with textable elements (TextView, TextField).
*   [SelectableTextView (‚≠ê632)](https://github.com/jhurray/SelectableTextView) - A text view that supports selection and expansion.
*   [TaniwhaTextField (‚≠ê26)](https://github.com/iceman201/TaniwhaTextField) - TaniwhaTextField is a lightweight and beautiful swift textfield framework. It has float label pattern, and also you can highly customise it.
*   [SearchTextField (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/apasccon/SearchTextField) - UITextField subclass with autocompletion suggestions list.
*   [Tagging (‚≠ê123)](https://github.com/k-lpmg/Tagging) - TextView that provides easy to use tagging feature for Mention or Hashtag.

### UIPageControl / Collection View Layout

*   [PageControl (‚≠ê118)](https://github.com/kasper-lahti/PageControl) - A nice, animated UIPageControl alternative.
*   [PageControls (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/popwarsweet/PageControls) - This is a selection of custom page controls to replace UIPageControl, inspired by a dribbble found here.
*   [Page-Control (‚≠ê32)](https://github.com/sevruk-dev/page-control) - Beautiful, animated and highly customizable UIPageControl alternative.

### Utility / Collection View Layout

*   [EZSwiftExtensions (‚≠ê3k)](https://github.com/goktugyil/EZSwiftExtensions) - :smirk: How Swift standard types and classes were supposed to work.
*   [Pantry (‚≠ê827)](https://github.com/nickoneill/Pantry) - The missing light persistence layer for Swift.
*   [OrderedSet (‚≠ê251)](https://github.com/Weebly/OrderedSet) - A Swift collection of unique, ordered objects.
*   [Scale (‚≠ê323)](https://github.com/onmyway133/scale) - Unit converter in Swift (available via CocoaPods).
*   [Standard Template Protocols (‚≠ê377)](https://github.com/cconeil/Standard-Template-Protocols) - Protocols for your every day iOS needs.
*   [TimeLord (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/JonFir/TimeLord) - Easy DateTime (NSDate) management in Swift.
*   [Sugar (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/hyperoslo/Sugar) - Something sweet that goes great with your Cocoa.
*   [Then (‚≠ê4.3k)](https://github.com/devxoul/Then) - ‚ú® Super sweet syntactic sugar for Swift initializers.
*   [Kvitto (‚≠ê296)](https://github.com/Cocoanetics/Kvitto) - App Store Receipt Validation.
*   [Notificationz (‚≠ê77)](https://github.com/SwiftKitz/Notificationz) - Helping you own NSNotificationCenter in Swift.
*   [SwiftFoundation (‚≠ê628)](https://github.com/PureSwift/SwiftFoundation) - Cross-Platform, Protocol-Oriented Programming base library to complement the Swift Standard Library. (Pure Swift, Supports Linux).
*   [VersionTrackerSwift (‚≠ê89)](https://github.com/tbaranes/VersionTrackerSwift) - Track which versions of your app a user has previously installed..
*   [AEAppVersion (‚≠ê12)](https://github.com/tadija/AEAppVersion) - Simple and Lightweight App Version Tracking for iOS written in Swift.
*   [SwiftyUtils (‚≠ê562)](https://github.com/tbaranes/swiftyutils) - All the reusable code that we need in each project.
*   [Outlets (‚≠ê130)](https://github.com/phatblat/Outlets) - Utility functions for validating IBOutlet and IBAction connections.
*   [EasyAbout (‚≠ê56)](https://github.com/JARMourato/EasyAbout) - A way to easily add CocoaPods licenses and App Version to your iOS App using the Settings Bundle.
*   [Validated (‚≠ê607)](https://github.com/Ben-G/Validated) - A Swift Œº-Library for Somewhat Dependent Types.
*   [Cent (‚≠ê227)](https://github.com/ankurp/Cent) - Extensions for Swift Standard Types and Classes.
*   [MissionControl-iOS (‚≠ê116)](https://github.com/appculture/MissionControl-iOS) - Super powerful remote config utility written in Swift (iOS, watchOS, tvOS, macOS).
*   [UnsupportedOSVersionAlert (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/caloon/UnsupportedOSVersionAlert) - Alerts users with a popup if they use an app with an unsupported version of iOS (e.g. iOS betas).
*   [XestiMonitors (‚≠ê271)](https://github.com/eBardX/XestiMonitors) - An extensible monitoring framework written in Swift.
*   [ExtensionalSwift](https://github.com/4taras4/SwiftExtension) - Useful swift extensions in one place.
*   [DefaultStringConvertible (‚≠ê120)](https://github.com/jessesquires/DefaultStringConvertible) - A default CustomStringConvertible implementation for Swift types.
*   [WhatsNew (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/BalestraPatrick/WhatsNew) - Showcase new features after an app update similar to Pages, Numbers and Keynote.
*   [ActionClosurable (‚≠ê124)](https://github.com/takasek/ActionClosurable) - Extensions which helps to convert objc-style target/action to swifty closures.
*   [ios\_system (‚≠ê957)](https://github.com/holzschu/ios_system) - Drop-in replacement for system() in iOS programs.
*   [DuctTape (‚≠ê177)](https://github.com/marty-suzuki/DuctTape) - KeyPath dynamicMemberLookup based syntax sugar for swift.

### VR / Collection View Layout

*   [VR Toolkit iOS (‚≠ê88)](https://github.com/Aralekk/VR_Toolkit_iOS) - A sample project that provides the basics to create an interactive VR experience on iOS.

### Walkthrough / Intro / Tutorial / Collection View Layout

*   [VideoSplashKit (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/svhawks/VideoSplashKit) - VideoSplashKit - UIViewController library for creating easy intro pages with background videos.
*   [paper-onboarding (‚≠ê3.3k)](https://github.com/Ramotion/paper-onboarding) - PaperOnboarding is a material design slider.
*   [SwiftyOverlay (‚≠ê81)](https://github.com/saeid/SwiftyOverlay) - Easy and quick way to show intro / instructions over app UI without any additional images in real-time!
*   [WhatsNewKit (‚≠ê4.2k)](https://github.com/SvenTiigi/WhatsNewKit) - Showcase your awesome new app features.
*   [OnboardKit (‚≠ê547)](https://github.com/NikolaKirev/OnboardKit) - Customisable user onboarding for your iOS app.

### WebSocket / Collection View Layout

*   [Starscream (‚≠ê8.5k)](https://github.com/daltoniam/Starscream) - Websockets in swift for iOS and macOS.
*   [Socks (‚≠ê571)](https://github.com/vapor-community/sockets) - Pure-Swift Sockets: TCP, UDP; Client, Server; Linux, macOS.
*   [SwifterSockets (‚≠ê59)](https://github.com/Balancingrock/SwifterSockets) - A collection of socket utilities in Swift for OS-X and iOS.

### Tools / Collection View Layout

*   [Misen (‚≠ê124)](https://github.com/tasanobu/Misen) - Script to support easily using Xcode Asset Catalog in Swift.
*   [WatchdogInspector (‚≠ê516)](https://github.com/tapwork/WatchdogInspector) - Shows your current framerate (fps) in the status bar of your iOS app.
*   [Cichlid (‚≠ê242)](https://github.com/dealforest/Cichlid) - automatically delete the current project's DerivedData directories.
*   [XCSwiftr (‚≠ê344)](https://github.com/dzenbot/XCSwiftr) - An Xcode Plugin to convert Objective-C to Swift.
*   [SwiftKitten (‚≠ê139)](https://github.com/johncsnyder/SwiftKitten) - Swift autocompleter for Sublime Text, via the adorable SourceKitten framework.
*   [AVXCAssets-Generator (‚≠ê347)](https://github.com/angelvasa/AVXCAssets-Generator) - AVXCAssets Generator takes path for your assets images and creates appiconset and imageset for you in just one click.
*   [SwiftCompilationPerformanceReporter (‚≠ê146)](https://github.com/TumblrArchive/SwiftCompilationPerformanceReporter) - Generate automated reports for slow Swift compilation paths in specific targets.
*   [BuildTimeAnalyzer (‚≠ê4.3k)](https://github.com/RobertGummesson/BuildTimeAnalyzer-for-Xcode) - Build Time Analyzer for Swift.
*   [Duration (‚≠ê325)](https://github.com/SwiftStudies/Duration) - A simple Swift package for measuring and reporting the time taken for operations.
*   [Benchmark (‚≠ê86)](https://github.com/WorldDownTown/Benchmark) - The Benchmark module provides methods to measure and report the time used to execute Swift code.
*   [MBAssetsImporter (‚≠ê71)](https://github.com/MatiBot/MBAssetsImporter) - Import assets from Panoramio or from your macOS file system with their metadata to your iOS simulator (Swift 2.0).
*   [Xtrace (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/johnno1962/Xtrace) - Trace Objective-C method calls by class or instance.
*   [playgroundbook (‚≠ê259)](https://github.com/playgroundbooks/playgroundbook) - Tool for Swift Playground books.
*   [Cookiecutter (‚≠ê525)](https://github.com/RahulKatariya/SwiftFrameworkTemplate) - A template for new Swift iOS / tvOS / watchOS / macOS Framework project ready with travis-ci, cocoapods, Carthage, SwiftPM and a Readme file.
*   [Attabench (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/attaswift/Attabench) - Microbenchmarking app for Swift with nice log-log plots.

### Extensions / Collection View Layout

*   [xTextHandler](https://github.com/cyanzhong/xTextHandler) - Xcode Source Editor Extension Toolset (Plugins for Xcode 8).
*   [Snowonder (‚≠ê107)](https://github.com/Karetski/Snowonder) - Magical import declarations formatter for Xcode.

### Other Xcode / Collection View Layout

*   [awesome-xcode-scripts (‚≠ê124)](https://github.com/aashishtamsya/awesome-xcode-scripts) - A curated list of useful xcode scripts.
*   [SBShortcutMenuSimulator (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/DeskConnect/SBShortcutMenuSimulator) - 3D Touch shortcuts in the Simulator.
*   [awesome-gitignore-templates (‚≠ê27)](https://github.com/aashishtamsya/awesome-gitignore-templates) - A collection of swift, objective-c, android and many more langugages .gitignore templates.
*   [Swift-VIPER-Module (‚≠ê546)](https://github.com/Juanpe/Swift-VIPER-Module) - Xcode template for create modules with VIPER Architecture written in Swift 3.
*   [ViperC (‚≠ê80)](https://github.com/abdullahselek/ViperC) - Xcode template for VIPER Architecture for both Objective-C and Swift.
items.content_html:
Reactive Programming

  • OpenCombine (‚≠ê2.8k) ‚Äî Open source implementation of Apple's Combine framework for processing values over time.

Tag / Collection View Layout

  • WSTagsField (‚≠ê1.3k) - An iOS text field that represents different Tags.
  • YNSearch (‚≠ê1.2k) - Awesome fully customizable search view like Pinterest written in Swift 3.

TextField & TextView / Collection View Layout

  • IQDropDownTextField (‚≠ê312) - TextField with DropDown support using UIPickerView.
  • StatefulViewController (‚≠ê2.1k) - Placeholder views based on content, loading, error or empty states.
  • MBAutoGrowingTextView (‚≠ê125) - An auto-layout base UITextView subclass which automatically grows with user input and can be constrained by maximal and minimal height - all without a single line of code.
  • TextFieldEffects (‚≠ê6k) - Custom UITextFields effects inspired by Codrops, built using Swift.
  • TJTextField (‚≠ê44) - UITextField with underline and left image.
  • UITextField-Navigation (‚≠ê445) - UITextField-Navigation adds next, previous and done buttons to the keyboard for your UITextFields.
  • AutoCompleteTextField (‚≠ê65) - Auto complete with suggestion textfield.
  • PasswordTextField (‚≠ê310) - A custom TextField with a switchable icon which shows or hides the password and enforce good password policies.
  • AnimatedTextInput (‚≠ê758) - Animated UITextField and UITextView replacement for iOS.
  • NxEnabled (‚≠ê34) - Library which allows you binding enabled property of button with textable elements (TextView, TextField).
  • SelectableTextView (‚≠ê632) - A text view that supports selection and expansion.
  • TaniwhaTextField (‚≠ê26) - TaniwhaTextField is a lightweight and beautiful swift textfield framework. It has float label pattern, and also you can highly customise it.
  • SearchTextField (‚≠ê1.1k) - UITextField subclass with autocompletion suggestions list.
  • Tagging (‚≠ê123) - TextView that provides easy to use tagging feature for Mention or Hashtag.

UIPageControl / Collection View Layout

  • PageControl (‚≠ê118) - A nice, animated UIPageControl alternative.
  • PageControls (‚≠ê1.1k) - This is a selection of custom page controls to replace UIPageControl, inspired by a dribbble found here.
  • Page-Control (‚≠ê32) - Beautiful, animated and highly customizable UIPageControl alternative.

Utility / Collection View Layout

  • EZSwiftExtensions (‚≠ê3k) - üòè How Swift standard types and classes were supposed to work.
  • Pantry (‚≠ê827) - The missing light persistence layer for Swift.
  • OrderedSet (‚≠ê251) - A Swift collection of unique, ordered objects.
  • Scale (‚≠ê323) - Unit converter in Swift (available via CocoaPods).
  • Standard Template Protocols (‚≠ê377) - Protocols for your every day iOS needs.
  • TimeLord (‚≠ê8) - Easy DateTime (NSDate) management in Swift.
  • Sugar (‚≠ê1.1k) - Something sweet that goes great with your Cocoa.
  • Then (‚≠ê4.3k) - ‚ú® Super sweet syntactic sugar for Swift initializers.
  • Kvitto (‚≠ê296) - App Store Receipt Validation.
  • Notificationz (‚≠ê77) - Helping you own NSNotificationCenter in Swift.
  • SwiftFoundation (‚≠ê628) - Cross-Platform, Protocol-Oriented Programming base library to complement the Swift Standard Library. (Pure Swift, Supports Linux).
  • VersionTrackerSwift (‚≠ê89) - Track which versions of your app a user has previously installed..
  • AEAppVersion (‚≠ê12) - Simple and Lightweight App Version Tracking for iOS written in Swift.
  • SwiftyUtils (‚≠ê562) - All the reusable code that we need in each project.
  • Outlets (‚≠ê130) - Utility functions for validating IBOutlet and IBAction connections.
  • EasyAbout (‚≠ê56) - A way to easily add CocoaPods licenses and App Version to your iOS App using the Settings Bundle.
